Starscream

Starscream couldn't help keep his temper down.

"No faction? NO FACTION! You have no idea who you are dealing with. 
Don't you guys have any spies in there? Megatron is planning 
something huge, and if you don't let me in their we're all going ot 
die!"
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq pondered Ramulus' question.

"I don't know. But if we add more metal on, we'll be too heavy and it 
won't matter if it holds or not. We have to take a chance. All 
aboard. One way ticket to The Ark!"

Brix and Fliq boarded the shuttle.
